Former Chief Minister's Son, Ex AAP Minister On BJP's 2nd List For Delhi Polls - NDTV
summary:
BJP Announces Second List of Candidates for Delhi Assembly Elections

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Local News

With less than a month remaining until the Delhi Assembly elections, the BJP has released its second list of 29 candidates, featuring notable figures, including former AAP members.

  • Kapil Mishra, former AAP MLA, runs from Karawal Nagar.
  • Harsh Khurana, son of former chief minister Madan Lal Khurana, is also on the list.
  • Karnail Singh to face former AAP minister Satyendar Jain in Shakur Basti.
  • Only one sitting MLA has been dropped, likely to make way for Mishra.
  • The BJP's total women candidates now stands at seven.
“...Mr Mishra joined the BJP in 2019 and made headlines...”

The BJP has now named candidates for 58 of the 70 Delhi Assembly seats, showcasing a strategic move to strengthen its political presence ahead of the elections.
newTitle: BJP Announces Second List of Candidates for Delhi Assembly Elections

Mohammed Shami returns for India's T20I series against England - ESPNcricinfo
summary:
Mohammed Shami Returns for India's T20I Series Against England

Publication Date: January 2024

Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Fast bowler Mohammed Shami has made a comeback to the India squad for the upcoming T20I series against England starting January 22 in Kolkata, after recovering from injury.

  • Shami last played for India in the ODI World Cup final in November 2023 and has undergone ankle surgery.
  • The T20I series will be led by Suryakumar Yadav.
  • Jasprit Bumrah and Rishabh Pant are notable exclusions from the squad due to injuries and rest.
  • The series includes five matches in various Indian cities followed by three ODIs in February.
“Mohammed Shami returns after key surgeries, aiming for a strong performance in the T20I series.”

The return of Mohammed Shami to the squad adds depth to India's bowling attack as they prepare to face England in the upcoming T20I series.
newTitle: Mohammed Shami Returns for India's T20I Series Against England

Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film sees dip in collections - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan film sees dip in collections

Date: Jan 11, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s new film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, collected ₹17.92 crore on its second day, bringing its total to ₹68.92 crore amid stiff competition during the festival season.

  • The film was released on January 10 and has received mixed reviews.
  • It is competing with other notable Sankranthi releases.
  • Despite high expectations, the occupancy rates were only decent compared to previous works by Shankar.
“Game Changer had high expectations but now faces stiff competition from newly released films.”

This film showcases Ram Charan in dual roles as an IAS officer and an activist, portraying significant political themes in its narrative.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 2: Ram Charan's Film Sees a Dip

Tamil Nadu governor RN Ravi's action ‘childish’: CM MK Stalin - Hindustan Times
summary:
Tamil Nadu Governor RN Ravi's Actions Criticized by CM MK Stalin

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Tamil Nadu chief minister MK Stalin criticized Governor RN Ravi for failing to address the state assembly and called his behavior 'childish'.

  • Stalin stated that RN Ravi seemed unable to accept the state's development.
  • The governor left the assembly without delivering a customary address due to the Tamil anthem not being played.
  • According to Stalin, Ravi’s actions disrespect the assembly and the people of Tamil Nadu.
“This House cannot bear to see the governor doing something with political motives that drags the position and responsibility he held by not respecting the dignity of this Assembly.”

In conclusion, CM Stalin's remarks reflect ongoing tensions between the Tamil Nadu government and the governor's office, highlighting issues of political integrity and respect in legislative procedures.
newTitle: Tamil Nadu Governor RN Ravi's Actions Criticized by CM MK Stalin

title: Priyanka Gandhi demands answers from PM Narendra Modi over falling value of rupee, reminds of his attacks on UPA - Hindustan Times
summary:
Priyanka Gandhi demands answers from PM Narendra Modi over falling value of rupee, reminds of his attacks on UPA

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra criticized the current government for the rupee reaching its lowest value against the US dollar, demanding accountability from Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

  • The rupee declined 18 paise to settle at 86.04 against the US dollar.
  • Priyanka recalled PM Modi's past statements during UPA's tenure linking rupee value with government prestige.
  • She emphasized that Modi should explain the current situation to the public.
  • Contributing factors include global crude oil prices and foreign funds outflow.
"Today he himself is the prime minister and all the records on the fall of the rupee have been broken. He should answer to the people of the country," Priyanka Gandhi stated.

This situation emphasizes the need for the government to respond effectively to economic challenges amidst changing global dynamics.
newTitle: Priyanka Gandhi Criticizes PM Modi Over Rupee's Decline

title: Mohammed Shami picked for T20 series against England - The Indian Express
summary:
Mohammed Shami picked for T20 series against England

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Fast bowler Mohammed Shami makes a comeback for India in the upcoming T20 series against England, starting January 22 in Kolkata, following his recovery from an ankle injury.

  • Shami last played for India in the 2023 World Cup final before being sidelined.
  • The selectors have chosen Dhruv Jurel as a backup wicketkeeper, with Sanju Samson as the first choice.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy also joins the T20 squad, while some players have been omitted due to performance or injury issues.
“Based on the current medical assessment, the BCCI medical team has determined that his knee requires more time for controlled exposure to bowling loads.”

This selection marks an important comeback for Shami, showing his resilience after injury and surgery.
newTitle: Mohammed Shami picked for T20 series against England
